2141.subject: HCOM
2141.descrlong: Prepares students to conduct in-depth and investigative reporting. Outcomes include learning advanced journalistic interviewing techniques, information gathering, and critical understanding of news sources. Focuses on the journalistic exploration of current social, economic, political, and environmental issues. Offers built-in assessment in the concentration in Journalism and Media Studies. Requires instructor consent. (Offered every other year.)
